description:
Кадровое агенство КА "QUEST" - SAP Recruitment Services (Москва) предлагает вакансию на должность Application development lead. Зарплата 6521 USD. Опыт работы до 2 лет. Образование высшее. Вакансия опубликована cегодня, 18:56.
The role will include • Leading of development and maintenance of internal applications for the Firm • Establishment of applications development framework for the Firm - standards and process for architecture design‚ programming‚ release‚ and technical documentation • Acting as practicing developer and architect - creation and enhancement of business applications‚ mostly ASP.NET‚ MS SQL • Management of application development projects • Management of team of developers: 2-4 persons The successful candidate should have the following experience / qualifications • Leading team of developers‚ people management skills • Establishing software development process and quality control procedures • Applications architecture design • Good knowledge of software development standards • Solid project management skills • Hands on experience in ASP.NET • Hands on experience in database development on MS SQL server • Hands on experience in MS Reporting Services • Hands on experience with development for MS SharePoint Portal Server Desired skills: • Experience with C# • Experience with MS Workflow Foundation • Experience with MS BizTalk Server • Experience with XML/XSL‚ COM/DCOM Personal Qualifications • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education • 3-5 years of experience in commercial software development on technologies required above. • 2-3 years of experience in people management. • 2-3 years of experience in management of software development projects. Ability to demonstrate results of these activities. • Ability to effectively translate business needs into technical solutions • Good command of written \ verbal Russian and English Supporting information • Direct reporting to: Applications Manager CIS • Region: Moscow • Department: IT • Very competitive Compensation package and Career opportunities • The salary to 150000 roubles gross‚ depending on qualification

responsibility.value:
The role will include

•     Leading of development and maintenance of internal applications for the Firm
•     Establishment of applications development framework for the Firm - standards and process for architecture design‚ programming‚ release‚ and technical documentation
•     Acting as practicing developer and architect - creation and enhancement of business applications‚ mostly ASP.NET‚ MS SQL
•     Management of application development projects
•     Management of team of developers: 2-4 persons

The successful candidate should have the following experience / qualifications

•     Leading team of developers‚ people management skills
•     Establishing software development process and quality control procedures
•     Applications architecture design
•     Good knowledge of software development standards 
•     Solid project management skills
•     Hands on experience in ASP.NET
•     Hands on experience in database development on MS SQL server
•     Hands on experience in MS Reporting Services
•     Hands on experience with development for MS SharePoint Portal Server

Desired skills:

•     Experience with C#
•     Experience with MS Workflow Foundation
•     Experience with MS BizTalk Server
•     Experience with XML/XSL‚ COM/DCOM

Personal Qualifications

•     Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education
•     3-5 years of experience in commercial software development on technologies required above. 
•     2-3 years of experience in people management.
•     2-3 years of experience in management of software development projects. Ability to demonstrate results of these activities. 
•     Ability to effectively translate business needs into technical solutions
•     Good command of written \ verbal Russian and English 

Supporting information

•     Direct reporting to: Applications Manager CIS
•     Region: Moscow
•     Department: IT
•     Very competitive Compensation package and Career opportunities
•     The salary to 150000 roubles gross‚ depending on qualification
